questions.english_text: There is a new girl in Zip's class, and Zip wants to be her friend. How could Zip get to know her?
questions.welsh_text: Mae merch newydd yn nosbarth Zip, ac mae Zip yn awyddus i fod yn ffrind iddi. Sut y gallai Zip ddod i'w hadnabod?

solutions.english_text: Zip could say hi
solutions.welsh_text: Gallai Zip ddweud "Helo"

solutions.english_text: Zip could sit near her
solutions.welsh_text: Gallai Zip eistedd wrth ei hymyl

solutions.english_text: Zip could throw a rubber at her to get her attention
solutions.welsh_text: Gallai Zip daflu rwber ati i gael ei sylw

solutions.english_text: Zip could play with her
solutions.welsh_text: Gallai Zip chwarae a hi

solutions.english_text: Zip could make sure no one else could talk to her
solutions.welsh_text: Gallai Zip sicrhau na allai neb arall siarad a hi

questions.english_text: Bing, Pop and Snap are playing a game of piggy in the middle in the school playground. Zip wants to play. How could Zip get to play?
questions.welsh_text: Mae Bing, Pop a Snap yn chwarae gem o foch bach yng nghanol iard yr ysgol. Mae Zip yn eisiau chwarae. Sut y gallai Zip ddod i chwarae?

solutions.english_text: Zip could join in without asking
solutions.welsh_text: Gallai Zip ymuno heb ofyn

solutions.english_text: Zip could ask to play
solutions.welsh_text: Gallai Zip ofyn i gael chwarae

solutions.english_text: Zip could start a new game of piggy in the middle with some other friends
solutions.welsh_text: Gallai Zip ddechrau gem newydd o foch bach yng nghanol yr iard gyda rhai ffrindiau eraill

solutions.english_text: Zip could try and grab the ball
solutions.welsh_text: Gallai Zip geisio gafael yn y bel

solutions.english_text: Zip could get cross with them for not including Zip and demand to play
solutions.welsh_text: Gallai Zip ddigio wrthyn nhw am beidio a chynnwys Zip a mynnu chwarae

questions.english_text: Bing is using all the paintbrushes and Zip wants to do some painting. How could Zip get a paintbrush?
questions.welsh_text: Mae Bing yn defnyddio'r holl frwsys paent a mae Zip eisiau gwneud rhywfaint o baentio. Sut y gallai Zip gael brws paent?

solutions.english_text: Zip could ask for a paintbrush
solutions.welsh_text: Gallai Zip ofyn i Bing am frws paent

solutions.english_text: Zip could tell the teacher about Bing so the teacher could tell Bing off
solutions.welsh_text: Gallai Zip ddweud wrth yr athrawes am Bing, fel y gallai'r athrawes ddweud y drefn wrth Bing

solutions.english_text: Zip could go away and forget about painting
solutions.welsh_text: Gallai Zip fynd i ffwrdd ac anghofio am baentio

solutions.english_text: Zip could tell Bing that it's selfish to use all the paintbrushes
solutions.welsh_text: Gallai Zip ddweud wrth Bing ei bod yn hunanol gan ddefnyddio'r holl frwsys paent

solutions.english_text: Zip could look to see if there was another paintbrush anywhere
solutions.welsh_text: Gallai Zip edrych i weld a oedd brws paent arall yn rhywle

questions.english_text: Zip brought a superhero toy into school. Just before home time Pop is playing with the superhero, and Zip wants it back. How could Zip get the superhero back before home time?
questions.welsh_text: Daeth Zip a thegan 'Superhero' i'r ysgol. Jest cyn amser mynd adref, mae Pop yn chwarae a'r 'Superhero', ac mae Zip yn awyddus i'w gael yn ol. Sut y gallai Zip gael y 'Superhero' yn ol cyn amser mynd adref?

solutions.english_text: Zip could warn Pop it's home time soon and that the superhero toy needed to go home with Zip
solutions.welsh_text: Gallai Zip rybuddio Pop ei bod bron yn amser mynd adref, a bod angen i'r tegan 'Superhero' fynd adref gyda Zip

solutions.english_text: Zip could watch the superhero carefully to know where it was
solutions.welsh_text: Gallai Zip wylio'r 'Superhero' yn ofalus i wybod lle roedd

solutions.english_text: Zip could take the superhero off Pop
solutions.welsh_text: Gallai Zip gymryd y 'Superhero' oddi ar Pop

solutions.english_text: Zip could give Pop a different toy to play with instead
solutions.welsh_text: Gallai Zip roi tegan gwahanol i Pop chwarae ag ef yn ei le

solutions.english_text: Zip could take Pop's toy that Pop had brought into school
solutions.welsh_text: Gallai Zip gymryd y tegan yr oedd Pop wedi dod ag ef i'r ysgol
